```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)

damages <- read_csv(here("Data", "damages.csv"))
warming <- read_csv(here("Data", "warming.csv"))
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = warming, aes(x = year, y = warming_baseline)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_line(data = warming, aes(x = year, y = warming_pulse), color = "red")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = damages, aes(x = warming, y = damages)) +
  geom_point() 
```
```{r}
#fit in linear regression model
linear_model <- lm(data = damages, formula = warming ~ damages)

#call summary
summary(linear_model)
```

```{r}
#create a new variable for damage^2
damages$damages2 <- damages$damages^2

ggplot(data = damages, aes(x = warming, y = damages2)) +
  geom_point()

quadratic_model <- lm(data = damages, formula = warming ~ damages + damages2)

summary(quadratic_model)
```
```{r}
#quadratic model with warming 
damages$warming2 <- damages$warming^2

quadratic_model_warming <- lm(data = damages, formula = damages ~ warming + warming2)

summary(quadratic_model_warming)
```


```{r}
predict_damages <- predict() 

```
